definition: letter/mail/CL:封[feng1]/to trust/to believe/to profess faith in/truthful/confidence/trust/at will/at random
breath/news/interest (on an investment or loan)/to cease/to stop/to rest/Taiwan pr. [xi2]
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: The phone system communicates the update to the front-desk information system.
sentences.chinese: 电话系统将更新的信息传送给前台信息系统。

sentences.english: It is pointed out that the establishment of national environmental monitoring information system (NEMIS) is urgent and feasible.
sentences.chinese: 分析了建立国家环境监理信息系统的迫切性和可行性。

sentences.english: Agile information system is the one of re constructivity and fast adaptability.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷信息系统是具有可重构能力的快速适应性系统。

sentences.english: Tony was applying for the Manager of Information Systems.
sentences.chinese: 托尼申请一个信息系统经理的职位。

sentences.english: Firstly, the attributes reduction algorithm is studied under the incomplete information systems.
sentences.chinese: 首先，研究了在不完备信息系统下的属性约简算法。

sentences.english: The healthcare information system was developed by the US Veterans Affairs.
sentences.chinese: 保健信息系统是由美国退伍军人事务处开发的。

sentences.english: Part seven explores the construcion of land-grading information system.
sentences.chinese: 第七部分，土地定级信息系统建设。

sentences.english: The information system also allows Li &Fung to look across its operations to identify trends.
sentences.chinese: 信息系统还让利丰公司审视其运营以发现趋势。

sentences.english: A block diagram is given according to which online program synchronous runnig is performed.
sentences.chinese: 从而远程联机信息系统就有它的新特点。

sentences.english: The application of ERP in enterprise information system construction is analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 对企业信息系统建没中ERP的应用进行了分析。

sentences.english: The new information system will greatly change the life-style of people.
sentences.chinese: 新的信息系统将极大地改变人们的生活方式。

sentences.english: Consider a hospital information system, for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如，考虑一个医院信息系统。

sentences.english: In this article, a design method for integrated maintenance information system (IMIS) is set forth.
sentences.chinese: 阐述了一种综合维修信息系统的设计方法。

sentences.english: Among the five aspects, the functions and the sub-system of Transportation Information System of Hubei Province are described in detail.
sentences.chinese: 重点叙述了湖北省交通信息系统的功能及各子系统。

sentences.english: The intelligence and information channel of the investigative department of economic crime needs to be improved.
sentences.chinese: 经侦部门的情报信息系统有待于进一步改善。

sentences.english: Computer virus is a great threat to the security of information system.
sentences.chinese: 计算机病毒是信息系统安全的大敌之一。

pinyin: wang3 luo4 guan3 li3 xi4 tong3

definition: informatization (the Information Age analog of industrialization)
